scripts.jekyll: docker run --rm --volume="$PWD:/srv/jekyll:Z" -e JEKYLL_UID="$(id -u $(whoami))" -e JEKYLL_GID="$(id -g $(whoami))" jekyll/jekyll:pages jekyll build
scripts.build: npm run windicss:build && npm run jekyll
scripts.dev: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npx serve _site' -e html,md,js,css,jpg,jpeg,png,svg -i _site -i assets/css/stylesheet.css
